SELECT a.rec_id as 'goodsMappingId', (a.service_times -IFNULL(b.returnNum,0)) AS 'returnNum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN (SELECT goods_mapping_id,count(1) returnNum FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE appt_status in (0,1,2,4) GROUP BY goods_mapping_id) b ON a.rec_id = b.goods_mapping_id WHERE a.order_id=#{orderId} AND a.group_id = #{goodsMappingId} AND a.is_real = 1 GROUP BY a.rec_id
SELECT a.goods_mapping_id AS 'goodsMappingId', SUM(a.service_times) AS 'serviceTimes' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.goods_mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.return_amount),0) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.goods_mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId}

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.mapping_id AS mappingId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.use_balance AS useBalance, a.user_id AS userId, a.user_office_id AS userOfficeId, a.user_beautician_id AS userBeauticianId, a.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, b.name AS belongOfficeName, a.belong_office_ids AS belongOfficeIds, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate FROM ydatadb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.belong_office_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.mapping_id AS mappingId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.use_balance AS useBalance, a.user_id AS userId, a.user_office_id AS userOfficeId, a.user_beautician_id AS userBeauticianId, a.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, b.name AS belongOfficeName, a.belong_office_ids AS belongOfficeIds, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate FROM ydatadb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.belong_office_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.type = 3 AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.mapping_id AS mappingId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount FROM ydatadb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.belong_office_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.details_id = #{detailsId} AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.id AS detailsId, a.order_id AS orderId, a.goods_mapping_id AS mappingId, SUM(a.return_amount) AS amount, a.apply_date AS applyDate, a.audit_date AS createDate FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.id = #{returnedId}

SELECT r.id AS pushmoneyRecordId, r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, r.user_office_id as userOfficeId, r.user_office_ids as userOfficeIds, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.create_by AS "createBy.id", r.create_date AS createDate, su1.`name` AS pushmoneyUserName, su1.mobile AS pushmoneyUserMobile, su2.`name` AS "createBy.name", td.`name` AS "departmentName" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r,trains.sys_user su1,trains.sys_user su2,trains.train_department td WHERE r.user_id = su1.id AND r.create_by = su2.id AND r.department_id = td.id AND r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id
